alert.note: Alert for Howard; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sevier and east central Howard Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lockesburg, or 9 miles southwest of Dierks, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Dierks, Lockesburg, Center Point, Lebanon, Muddy Fork, Silver Ridge, Geneva, Provo and Bellview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
